#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pi(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define p(x) printf("%lld\n",x)

using namespace std;

int a[1002][1002];
int dp[4][1002][1002];
int main(){
int t;
si(t);
while(t--){
   int n,m,i,j;
   si(n);si(m);
   for(i=0;i<=n+1;i++){
        for(j=0;j<=m+1;j++){
            a[i][j]=0;
            dp[0][i][j]=0;dp[1][i][j]=0;dp[2][i][j]=0;dp[3][i][j]=0;
        }
    }

   for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    for(j=1;j<=m;j++){
        si(a[i][j]);
    }
   }
   for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    for(j=1;j<=m;j++){
         dp[0][i][j] =min(dp[0][i-1][j]+a[i][j],a[i][j]);
         dp[1][n+1-i][j] =min(dp[1][n+1-i+1][j]+a[n+1-i][j],a[n+1-i][j]);
         dp[2][i][j] =min(dp[2][i][j-1]+a[i][j],a[i][j]);
         dp[3][i][m+1-j] =min(dp[3][i][m+1-j+1]+a[i][m+1-j],a[i][m+1-j]);
    }
   }

   int ans=INT_MAX;
   for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    for(j=1;j<=m;j++){
         ans=min(dp[0][i][j]+dp[1][i][j]+dp[2][i][j]+dp[3][i][j]-3*a[i][j],ans);
    }
   }
   pi(ans);

}

return 0;
}
